mapper.sql: a.create_time AS "createTime", a.shanghu AS "shanghu", a.deal_type AS "dealType", a.ext_order_no AS "extOrderNo", a.cash_amount AS "cashAmount", a.pay_way AS "payWay", a.score_type AS "scoreType", a.real_name AS "realName", a.user_mobile AS "userMobile"
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM v_shanghu_trade where user_mobile=#{userMobile}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO v_shanghu_trade( create_time, shanghu, deal_type, ext_order_no, cash_amount, pay_way, score_type, real_name, user_mobile ) VALUES ( #{createTime}, #{shanghu}, #{dealType}, #{extOrderNo}, #{cashAmount}, #{payWay}, #{scoreType}, #{realName}, #{userMobile} )
mapper.update: UPDATE v_shanghu_trade SET create_time = #{createTime}, shanghu = #{shanghu}, deal_type = #{dealType}, ext_order_no = #{extOrderNo}, cash_amount = #{cashAmount}, pay_way = #{payWay}, score_type = #{scoreType}, real_name = #{realName}, user_mobile = #{userMobile} WHERE id = #{id}
